abstract: Spain's Constitutional Court rejects resolution by regional Parliament of Catalonia that had outlined plan for region's independence from Spain by 2017.
lead_paragraph: The court ruling said the resolution, which was adopted on Nov. 9, violated the country’s Constitution.

headline.main: Spain: Court Rejects Resolution on Plan for Independence of Catalonia Region
headline.print_headline: Europe; Spain: Court Rejects Resolution on Plan for Independence of Catalonia Region

snippet: The court ruling said the resolution, which was adopted on Nov. 9, violated the country’s Constitution.
